description:
Audacity 3.7.2 open-source digital audio editor and recording software is now available for download with improvements for Linux and various bug fixes. Here’s what’s changed!

The post Audacity 3.7.2 Improves the Linux AppImage Bundle for Ubuntu 22.04 LTS appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Audacity 3.7.2 Improves the Linux AppImage Bundle for Ubuntu 22.04 LTS
